data.title: 5-Day Itinerary: Unveiling the Coastal Charm of Central Vietnam
data.description: Nestled along the vibrant coast of central Vietnam, Da Nang is a captivating city that seamlessly blends modern attractions with ancient wonders. From its pristine beaches and lush mountains to its rich cultural heritage and delectable cuisine, Da Nang offers
